overview: Frederic Papeians joined SoftKinetic from Hochschild Mining plc in London, UK. Previous to this position, Frederic spent 15 years at Alcatel (now Alcatel-Lucent) where he held a variety of management positions. From 2000 to 2006, he served as Vice President Sales & Marketing Europe & South (Europe, Middle East, Africa, India and South America) at Alcatelâ€™s headquarters in Paris, France. Prior to this role, Frederic was based in Antwerp, and served as Manager, Marketing and Business Development for Northern Europe. From 1995 to 1998, Frederic, as Deputy General Manager and Member of the Board of Directors, successfully started the alternative telecom operator Metrolel in Barranquilla, Colombia. Frederic joined Alcatel in 1989 as a Sales Manager for Singapore and Australia. Frederic received an M.Sc. in Electrical and Mechanical Engineering from the University of Brussels and earned a Master of Business Administration from Harvard Business School where he was a Fulbright Scholar.
